Articles.Content:
Every time I try to update to 1.0.2 from 1.0 the Patcher tells me this:

Preparation 

Detecting if OS-resident rsync is present... 

rsync is not already installed, so making use of bin\rsync.exe. 

Authentication 

Getting login token... 

Unable to authenticate with the server: Received malformed data from the server: File not found. 

Can anyone tell me what's up here?

The patcher is currently broken. As far as I can tell, rsync isn't in the ksp directory, and index.php is missing from the ksp website, so to update you'll have to download 1.0.2 from the website and copy over your 1.0.0 install
